name: Umf
body:
<script
src="http://cdn.mathjax.org/mathjax/latest/MathJax.js?config=TeX-
AMS-MML_HTMLorMML">  
</script>
   V(x,t)=\frac{\theta(t)}{(2a\sqrt{\pi t})^n} \int_{R^n} u_0(\xi)exp \left\{ - \frac{ |\chi - \xi | ^2}{4a^2t}\right\} d\xi
\]

 И удовлетворяет неравенству

 \[ 

|V(x,t)|\le sup|u_0(\xi)|,t>0, \xi\in R^n\

\]
